basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Chu, Ka Ying. A passionate Software Engineer with a Diploma in Computer Studies (Canada) and a Bachelor's degree in Computing. With 1.5 years of part-time web development experience and 9 months as a Full-Time Software Engineer, I specialize in JavaScript and have in-depth expertise in React, including its core principles and performance optimization. I also like to explore various interesting and fun cutting-edge technologies. Thanks for stopping by!

projects.title: 3D Museum
projects.description: A 3D website made with React-Three-fiber, with AR and AI features, for DIYing your own collectibles.

projects.title: Pet Store
projects.description: A complete management system, using PostgreSQL as the database. Features include user and administrator authentication, with administrators and users having different permissions, such as being able to view and delete user information and update pet lists. Users can search, add fav, comment, and like posts.

projects.title: Health Assistant
projects.description: This iOS app is developed in Swift. It features a built-in chatbot with a default avatar designed to resemble a campus health assistant, and an interactive map supporting automated navigation. The user authentication system powered by Firebase Authentication, allowing profile customization including photo uploads (stored in Firebase Storage).
